title: Stolen account
body: My account has been stolen, the person how has stolen it has changed the password and the email connected to it. They have defriended all my friends so they can't view the account. I have no idea what to do know because I've already sent in a ticket and they haven't responded, so i was wondering if anyone here could help, The IGN was thetomguy. The account I'm posting this from is a friends.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please wait for a response to your support ticket, support is currently backed up so an initial response may take longer than expected 24+ hours, please rest assured that as soon as your ticket is picked up the account will be locked to prevent further unauthorised actions being taken.

Please refrain from adding additional info to your ticket unless absolutely necessary  as this will push you to the back of the ticket queue.

"Bumping" Your ticket will also do the same.
Thank you, I will try to wait a bit longer.
